title: El Camino: A Breaking Bad Movie fails to load on Netflix
text:
Fans just can’t cope

(Picture: Ben Rothstein/Netflix via AP)

The hotly anticipated El Camino: A Breaking Bad Movie has officially launched today – but some fans are having a meltdown because the it won’t load on Netflix.

The hype for the film has been building for weeks, but ‘technical difficulties’ on the release date has sent Breaking Bad fans into a frenzy – and they just can’t cope.

The UK and Ireland account for Netflix announced on Twitter: ‘El Camino: A Breaking Bad Movie (!!!) is now streaming.’

However… within minutes the post was flooded with complaints as frustrated viewers revealed the film wasn’t showing up on their dashboards.

‘It’s not on mine,’ one person tweeted.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Another commented: ‘Am I the only person who it’s not appearing for then yeah?’

To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

While another added: ‘Nope, nothing here,” alongside an angry emoji.’

“One said: ‘No it’s not, what’s going on?!’

Stuck on 20% logged out and back in still the same!!!!! — Caroline (@morcaroline) October 11, 2019

Addressing the several complaints, Netflix replied: ‘If you can’t see it yet, log out and in again. Yeah science.’

El Camino launched on Netflix today (Picture: AMC)

Although following their response and after numerous attempts to watch the movie, it still wasn’t working for many fans.

One said: ‘It is stuck on 20%.’

While another tweeted: ‘No, still nothing!’

However, there were some who claimed the fix had worked for them, buzzing with excitement at the prospect of diving into the flick.

What’s more, given the number of joyful tweets elsewhere from fans who had started watching the film, it’s safe to say the issue wasn’t affecting the majority of Netflix subscribers.

El Camino: A Breaking Bad Movie is available to steam on Netflix now

description: El Camino: A Breaking Bad Movie fails to load on Netflix - and fans went into meltdown
